languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} движется по прямой линии и атакует в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Такая атака не расходует запас {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, которые воин может совершить. Рывок можно применить, только если между воином и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter moves in a straight line and strikes the target that interrupts the Fighter's path with a melee attack. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Fighter's attacks per turn.

The Fighter moves in a straight line and launches a melee attack against the target in the Fighter's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Fighter's attacks per turn. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Fighter and the target to use Charge.

The Fighter moves in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in the Fighter's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Fighter's attacks per turn. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Fighter and the target to use Charge.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} движется по прямой линии и атакует в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Такая атака не расходует запас {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, которые воин может совершить. Рывок можно применить, только если между воином и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Воин движется по прямой линии и атакует в ближнем бою цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Такая атака не расходует запас атак, которые воин может совершить за ход. Рывок можно применить, только если между воином и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.

Воин движется по прямой линии и атакует в ближнем бою цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Такая атака не расходует запас атак, которые воин может совершить за ход. Рывок можно применить, только если между воином и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}沿着直线移动，对路径上的所有目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}。此次攻击不计入战士{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击次数{/g}上限。 战士与目标之间必须至少隔着2个空格子，才能使用英勇冲锋。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: 战士沿着直线移动，对路径上的所有目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}。此次攻击不计入战士{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合攻击{/g}次数上限。 战士与目标之间必须至少隔着两个空格子，才能使用英勇冲锋。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} se mueve en línea recta y realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra cualquier objetivo que encuentre en su camino. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} del guerrero. Debe haber por lo menos 2 casillas libres entre el guerrero y su objetivo para poder usar Carga.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: El guerrero se mueve en línea recta y realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra cualquier objetivo que encuentre en su camino. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} del guerrero. Debe haber por lo menos 2 casillas libres entre el guerrero y su objetivo para poder usar Carga.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} bewegt sich in einer geraden Linie und führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen ein beliebiges Ziel auf seinem Weg aus. Dieser Angriff wird nicht auf das Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe pro Zug{/g} angerechnet. Es müssen mindestens 2 freie Felder zwischen dem Krieger und dem Ziel sein, um Ansturm einzusetzen.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger bewegt sich in einer geraden Linie und führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen ein beliebiges Ziel im Weg des Kriegers aus. Dieser Angriff wird nicht auf das Limit der {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffe des Kriegers pro Zug{/g} angerechnet. Es müssen mindestens 2 freie Felder zwischen dem Krieger und dem Ziel sein, um Ansturm einzusetzen.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} se déplace en ligne droite et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} contre toute cible se trouvant sur son chemin. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} du guerrier. Pour pouvoir utiliser la capacité Charge, au moins 2 cases doivent être libres entre le guerrier et la cible.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Le Combattant se déplace en ligne droite et lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} contre toute cible se trouvant sur son chemin. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} du Combattant. Pour pouvoir utiliser la capacité Charge, au moins 2 cases doivent être libres entre le Combattant et la cible.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が直線に移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を繰り出す。この攻撃はファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンあたりの攻撃回数{/g}制限にはカウントされない。 突撃を使用するには、ターゲットとファイターの間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: 直線に移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を繰り出す。この攻撃はファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンあたりの攻撃回数{/g}制限にはカウントされない。 突撃を使用するには、ターゲットとファイターの間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, düz bir çizgi boyunca ilerler ve yoluna çıkan her türlü hedefe bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Bu saldırı, Savaşçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz. Savaşçı'nın Hücum edebilmesi için hedefle arasında en az 2 boş hücre olması gerekir.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.
